SLIReceived(address,uint256,bytes32,uint.details: event emitted when having a response from Chainlink with the SLI

_encodeQuery(string,string,string).details: returns Graphql query for Chainlink GET request of SLI

params._chainlinkOracle: the address of the oracle to create requests to

fulfillSLI(bytes32,uint256).details: The callback function for the Chainlink SLI request which stores the SLI in the SLA contract

params._requestId: the ID of the ChainLink request
params._sliValue: the SLI value returned by ChainLink

getPeriod(address,uint256).details: gets the start and end of a given SLA on a given period

requestSLI(uint256,address,bytes32).details: Creates a ChainLink request to get a new SLI value for the given params

params._periodId: bytes32 value of the period id
params._sloName: the SLO name to get the SLI value for

setSLARegistry().details: This sets the SLARegistry contract address and can only be called once
